com.rexsl.test
Class ContainerMocker

java.lang.Object
  com.rexsl.test.ContainerMocker

public final class ContainerMocker
extends Object

Mocker of Java Servlet container.

A convenient tool to test your application classes against a web service. For example: 

 URI home = new ContainerMocker()
   .expectMethod("GET")
   .expectHeader("Accept", Matchers.startsWith("text/"))
   .returnBody("<done/>")
   .returnStatus(200)
   .mock()
   .home();
 // sometime later
 RestTester.start(home)
   .header("Accept", "text/xml")
   .get("Load sample page")
   .assertStatus(200);

Keep in mind that container automatically reserves a new free TCP port and works until JVM is shut down. The only way to stop it is to call stop().

Version:
$Id: ContainerMocker.java 1569 2012-05-04 12:09:56Z guard $
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@rexsl.com)
See Also:
RestTester
